name: luminaire

an electric light: Electricians installed a total of 98 LED luminaires throughout the entire house. The advanced optical design of the luminaires delivers light exactly where it is needed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe enormous selection of luminaires available on the market is daunting.The company can offer advice on specialist luminaires for specific applications.This high precision optic luminaire is designed to project an image, logo, decoration or message onto walls, floors or ceilings.
